document.full_text: as the biggest spending cut in u.s. history takes shape in congress, republicans are preparing a more ambitious proposal that could scale back the benefit programs that account for the majority of government spending.
document.title: republicans eye bigger cuts amid u.s. budget fight
lines_and_colors: as the biggest spending cut in u.s. history takes shape in congress, republicans are preparing a more ambitious proposal that could scale back the benefit programs that account for the majority of government spending.
